price: 9. Muusaw! Diggah anu Yallay qibaada cakkisitay Maysoleeh naggaarah yani kinniyo.
arabic: يَٰمُوسَىٰٓ إِنَّهُۥٓ أَنَا ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡعَزِيزُ ٱلۡحَكِيمُ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: yāmūsā innahu anā al-lahu al-ʿazīzu al-ḥakīmu
